ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary: Expecting to meet with Tarot, Jon makes a visit to Witch Manor only to find that she's been called away to confront the revenge hungry Dragon Witches. What he does find is a broken Raven Hex in need. Playing nursemaid to the Dark Witch was the last thing Jon expected!
ComicInfo.Title: No Rest For The Witchy!!
ComicInfo.Characters: Tarot,Mudwart,Skeleton Man,Pooka,Son of Mor-Meb-Dred,Dragon Witch,Raven Hex,Tarot's Mother
